text: Alfredo Magarotto (16 February 1927 - 22 January 2021) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1950. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Chioggia, Italy, from 1990 to 1997. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Vittorio Veneto, Italy, from 1997 to 2003. Magarotto died on 22 January 2021, aged 93.Diocese of Vittorio Venetia ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Alfredo Magarotto
